Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

superOps module¶

superOps.py: Main module for performing pure or mixed iTEBD simulations.

superOps.apply(A, B)[source]¶

Apply operator A to B. Applying means A.B.A.conj().T

superOps.buildBasis(d)[source]¶
superOps.commutator(A, B)[source]¶
superOps.directsum(A, B)[source]¶
superOps.dissipator(Op, B)[source]¶
superOps.lindblad(Ops, B)[source]¶
superOps.master(Ops, B)[source]¶
superOps.matrixInnerProduct(A, B)[source]¶

Return the inner product between two matrices.

The inner product is defined as
<A|B> = Tr( A^dagger * B )/dim(A)
superOps.mult(A, B)[source]¶

Return dot product between A and B.

superOps.superOperator(Op, d, func=<function mult at 0x108cc3398>)[source]¶

Make a superoperator representing [func] out of Op.
